LanguageData.Pa_NbW32cm.label: Nebelwerfer
LanguageData.Pa_NbW32cm.description: Nebelwefer attached to a Mobile platform.
LanguageData.Pa_NbW.label: Nebelwerfer
LanguageData.Pa_NbW.description: Nebelwefer attached to a Skeleton platform.
LanguageData.Turret_NbW32cm.label: Nebelwerfer(28cm/30cm/32cm)
LanguageData.Turret_NbW32cm.description: An ancient Multi-barrel Heavy Rocket Launcher, robust and simple, feared by many, one of the few cost-efficient weapon from the Wunderwaffen Project, but the rocket projectile is too heavy and highly decrease its effective range.
LanguageData.Turret_NbW.label: Wurfrahmen
LanguageData.Turret_NbW.description: Single Wurfrahmen launcher frame that can place in any open field with its support/platform.
LanguageData.Pa_NbW_Crate.label: Nebelwerfer crate
LanguageData.Pa_NbW_Crate.description: Use this to build a Nebelwerfer turret.
LanguageData.MinifiedTurret_Pa_NbW32cm.label: Nebelwefer turret
